info.title: SmartScheduler API
info.description: SmartScheduler API for job scheduling and contractor management

get.description: Retrieves a list of all contractors. Optionally filter by skills and limit results.

post.description: Creates a new contractor with the provided information.

get.description: Retrieves a specific contractor by their unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing contractor with the provided information.

delete.description: Deletes a contractor by their unique identifier.

put.description: Updates the working hours for a contractor.

post.description: Adds a calendar exception (holiday or override) to a contractor's calendar.

delete.description: Removes a calendar exception from a contractor's calendar by date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

put.description: Updates a contractor's rating (Admin only). Rating must be between 0-100.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all jobs. Optionally filter by status and priority, and limit results.

post.description: Creates a new job with the provided information. Address validation and timezone lookup are performed automatically.

get.description: Retrieves a specific job by its unique identifier.

put.description: Updates an existing job with the provided information. Only provided fields will be updated.

get.summary: Get latest recommendations for a job
get.description: Retrieves the most recent contractor recommendations for a job. Returns 404 if no recommendations have been calculated.

put.description: Updates the status of an existing job. Valid status transitions are enforced.

post.description: Assigns a job to a contractor with the specified time slot. Availability is re-validated before assignment. Returns existing assignment if same request (idempotent).

put.description: Reschedules a job to a new time slot. Validates feasibility for all assigned contractors and updates assignments accordingly.

post.description: Cancels a job and all its active assignments. Cannot cancel completed jobs.
Get ranked contractor recommendations for a job with up to 3 suggested time slots per contractor.
Recalculates contractor recommendations for a job, updates the job's recommendation reference, and publishes a real-time update event.

get.description: Get list of job types available for job creation

post.description: Add a new job type to the system

delete.description: Remove a job type from the system

get.description: Get list of skills available for contractors and job requirements

post.description: Add a new skill to the system

delete.description: Remove a skill from the system

get.description: Get the currently active scoring weights configuration
Get history of all weights configuration versions

post.description: Create a new version of the weights configuration
Rollback to a previous version of the weights configuration
Populates the database with realistic demo data across multiple US timezones

delete.description: WARNING: Deletes ALL data from the database (contractors, jobs, assignments, audit records, event logs). This operation cannot be undone!

get.description: Gets counts of all data in the database
Retrieves dashboard statistics including active contractors, pending jobs, average assignment time, and utilization rate. Results are cached for 5 minutes.
Retrieves recent system activities from the event log. Supports filtering by activity types and limiting results.
